headline: Energy Stocks Are Dropping Because China’s Slowdown Is Real
summary: The International Energy Agency expects Chinese oil demand to grow by just 140,000 barrels a day in 2024, versus 1.4 million barrels in 2023.

headline: ExxonMobil Could Produce $165 Billion in Surplus Cash After Paying Dividends Through 2030
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) has become a cash-gushing machine in recent years.  The oil giant delivered industry-leading cash flow from operations of $17.6 million during the third quarter.  The oil company could produce an even bigger cash flow gusher in the coming years.
